verses.verse: My <S%H1121>son,<s%> do not <S%H7911>forget<s%> my <S%H8451>teaching,<s%> But let your <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H5341>keep<s%> my <S%H4687>commandments;<s%>
For <S%H753>length<s%> of <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H9132>life,<s%> And <S%H7965>peace<s%> they will <S%H3254>add<s%> to you.

Do not let <S%H2617>kindness<s%> and <S%H571>truth<s%> <S%H5800>leave<s%> you; <S%H7194>Bind<s%> them <S%H5921>around<s%> your <S%H1621>neck,<s%> <S%H3789>Write<s%> them on the <S%H3871>tablet<s%> of your <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
So you will <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7922>repute<s%> In the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> and <S%H120>man.<s%>
<S%H982>Trust<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3820>heart,<s%> And do not <S%H8172>lean<s%> on your own <S%H998>understanding.<s%>
In <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H3045>acknowledge<s%> Him, And He will <S%H3474>make<s%> your <S%H734>paths<s%> <S%H3474>straight.<s%>
Do not be <S%H2450>wise<s%> in your own <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H5493>turn<s%> <S%H5493>away<s%> from <S%H9563>evil.<s%>
It will be <S%H7500>healing<s%> to your <S%H8270>body,<s%> And <S%H8250>refreshment<s%> to your <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
<S%H3513>Honor<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> from your <S%H1952>wealth,<s%> And from the <S%H7225>first<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H8393>produce;<s%>
So your <S%H618>barns<s%> will be <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H7647>plenty,<s%> And your <S%H3342>vats<s%> will <S%H6555>overflow<s%> with <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> do not <S%H3988>reject<s%> the <S%H4148>discipline<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> Or <S%H6973>loathe<s%> His <S%H9640>reproof,<s%>
For <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H157>loves<s%> He <S%H3198>reproves,<s%> Even as a father, the <S%H1>son<s%> in whom he <S%H1121>delights.<s%>
How <S%H835>blessed<s%> is the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H4672>finds<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> And the <S%H120>man<s%> who <S%H6329>gains<s%> <S%H8394>understanding.<s%>
For its <S%H5504>profit<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H5504>profit<s%> of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> And its <S%H8393>gain<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> fine <S%H2742>gold.<s%>
She is <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H6443>jewels;<s%> And <S%H3605>nothing<s%> <S%H3808><s%> you <S%H2656>desire<s%> <S%H9586>compares<s%> with her.
<S%H753>Long<s%> <S%H3117>life<s%> is in her <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand;<s%> In her <S%H8040>left<s%> <S%H8040>hand<s%> are <S%H6239>riches<s%> and <S%H9202>honor.<s%>
Her <S%H1870>ways<s%> are <S%H5278>pleasant<s%> <S%H1870>ways,<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> her <S%H9350>paths<s%> are <S%H7965>peace.<s%>
She is a <S%H6086>tree<s%> of <S%H9132>life<s%> to those who <S%H2388>take<s%> <S%H2388>hold<s%> of her, And <S%H833>happy<s%> are all who <S%H8551>hold<s%> her <S%H8551>fast.<s%>
The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> by <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> <S%H3245>founded<s%> the <S%H776>earth;<s%> By <S%H8394>understanding<s%> He <S%H3559>established<s%> the <S%H8064>heavens.<s%>
By His <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> the <S%H8415>deeps<s%> were <S%H1234>broken<s%> up, And the <S%H7834>skies<s%> <S%H7491>drip<s%> with <S%H2919>dew.<s%>
My <S%H1121>son,<s%> let them not <S%H3868>depart<s%> from your <S%H5869>sight;<s%> <S%H5341>Keep<s%> <S%H8454>sound<s%> <S%H8454>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion,<s%>
So they will be <S%H9132>life<s%> to your <S%H5315>soul,<s%> And <S%H2580>adornment<s%> to your <S%H1621>neck.<s%>
<S%H227>Then<s%> you will <S%H1980>walk<s%> in your <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H983>securely,<s%> And your <S%H7272>foot<s%> will not <S%H5062>stumble.<s%>
<S%H518>When<s%> you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> you will not be <S%H6342>afraid;<s%> When you <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H7901>down,<s%> your <S%H8142>sleep<s%> will be <S%H6149>sweet.<s%>
Do not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of <S%H6597>sudden<s%> <S%H6343>fear,<s%> <S%H408>Nor<s%> of the <S%H9585>onslaught<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> it <S%H935>comes;<s%>
For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will be your <S%H3689>confidence,<s%> And will <S%H8104>keep<s%> your <S%H7272>foot<s%> from being <S%H3921>caught.<s%>
Do not <S%H4513>withhold<s%> <S%H9185>good<s%> from those to whom it is <S%H1167>due,<s%> When it is in your <S%H3027>power<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> [it.]

Do not <S%H559>say<s%> to your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> <S%H1980>"Go,<s%> and <S%H7725>come<s%> <S%H7725>back,<s%> And <S%H4279>tomorrow<s%> I will <S%H5414>give<s%> [it,]" When you <S%H3426>have<s%> it with you.
Do not <S%H9177>devise<s%> <S%H9567>harm<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> your <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> While he <S%H3427>lives<s%> in <S%H983>security<s%> <S%H854>beside<s%> you.
Do not <S%H7378>contend<s%> with a <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H2600>without<s%> <S%H2600>cause,<s%> <S%H518>If<s%> he has <S%H1580>done<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H9567>harm.<s%>
Do not <S%H7065>envy<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H2555>violence,<s%> And do not <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> of his <S%H1870>ways.<s%>
For the <S%H3868>crooked<s%> [man] is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> But He is <S%H5475>intimate<s%> with the <S%H3477>upright.<s%>
The <S%H3994>curse<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is on the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> But He <S%H1288>blesses<s%> the <S%H5116>dwelling<s%> of the <S%H6662>righteous.<s%>
<S%H518>Though<s%> He <S%H9238>scoffs<s%> at the <S%H9238>scoffers,<s%> Yet He <S%H5414>gives<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> to the <S%H6035>afflicted.<s%>
The <S%H2450>wise<s%> will <S%H5157>inherit<s%> <S%H9202>honor,<s%> But <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H7311>display<s%> <S%H7036>dishonor.<s%>
